# Tether

A sci-fi series about a man who left Earth behind—and the connection that pulls him back.

## Read Online

**https://read-tether.pages.dev**

## Repository Structure

```
tether/
├── screenplays/      # .fountain screenplay files
├── story-bible/      # World-building and series bible
├── web/              # Screenplay web reader (Cloudflare Pages)
└── pitch-bible.md    # Series pitch document
```

## Development

See [web/README.md](web/README.md) for build and deploy instructions.
